#!/usr/bin/python
# coding=utf-8
#
# <bitbar.title>Ripplecoin Ticker ($1USD)</bitbar.title>
# <bitbar.version>v1.0</bitbar.version>
# <bitbar.author>impshum</bitbar.author>
# <bitbar.author.github>impshum</bitbar.author.github>
# <bitbar.desc>Displays current Ripplecoin price for $1 from Coinmarketcap</bitbar.desc>
# <bitbar.image>http://i.imgur.com/2xOj6Pu.jpg</bitbar.image>
#
# by impshum

from urllib import urlopen
url = urlopen('https://coinmarketcap-nexuist.rhcloud.com/api/xrp').read()

import json
result = json.loads(url)

def flow():
    if result ['change'] > '0':
        print (' $%.4f |  color=#000000'% float(result['price']['usd']))
    else:
        print (' $%.4f |  color=#000000'% float(result['price']['usd']))

flow()
